languages.text: "Твой дом мертв — правильным будет и тебе последовать за ним".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Yrliet: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

languages.text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
languages.original_text: "Твой дом мертв — правильным будет и тебе последовать за ним".

traits.locale_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Euer Haus ist tot — wenn Ihr das Richtige tun wollt, solltet Ihr ihm folgen."
languages.original_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Haus ist tot — wenn Ihr das Richtige tun wollt, solltet Ihr ihm folgen."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Votre maison est morte, et la meilleure chose que vous ayez à faire, c'est de suivre son exemple. »
languages.original_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."

traits.locale_text: « Votre maison est morte, et la meilleure chose que vous ayez à faire, c'est de suivre son exemple. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Tu casa ha muerto. Lo correcto sería que la acompañaras».
languages.original_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."

traits.locale_text: «Tu casa ha muerto. Lo correcto sería que la acompañaras».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の家は死んだ。お前には、それを追うしかできない」
languages.original_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の家は死んだ。お前には、それを追うしかできない」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “你的故乡毁灭了。你唯一该做的事情，就是陪它一起上路。”
languages.original_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."

traits.locale_text: “你的故乡毁灭了。你唯一该做的事情，就是陪它一起上路。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your house is dead — the right thing to do is for you to follow it too."
